broadwick

Class BroadwickConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • broadwick.BroadwickConstants

  • public final class BroadwickConstants
extends Object
    All the constants for the Broadwick framework are defined here.

    • Method Detail

      • getDate

        public static int getDate(org.joda.time.DateTime date)
        Convert a date object to an integer (number of days from a fixed start date, here 1/1/1900). All dates in the database are stored as integer values using this method.
        Parameters:
        date - the date object we are converting.
        Returns:
        the number of days from a fixed 'zero date'.

      • toDate

        public static org.joda.time.DateTime toDate(int date)
        Convert an integer (number of days from a fixed start date, here 1/1/1900) to a DateTime object. All dates in the database are stored as integer values, this method converts that integer to a DateTime object.
        Parameters:
        date - the integer date offset.
        Returns:
        the datetime object corresponding to the 'zero date' plus date.

      • getDate

        public static int getDate(String date,
          String dateFormat)
        Convert a date object to an integer (number of days from a fixed start date, here 1/1/1900). All dates in the database are stored as integer values using this method.
        Parameters:
        date - the date object we are converting.
        dateFormat - the format the date is in when doing the conversion.
        Returns:
        the number of days from a fixed 'zero date'.
